landing.badge: Bina Marga Kota Jambi | Road Project Management
landing.subtitle: SigiMarga is the all-in-one platform for Bina Marga Kota Jambi — from automated S-Curve tracking and BoQ management to real-time progress monitoring. Everything your team needs, in one place.

features.subtitle: Core Capabilities
features.title: Built for Accuracy, Designed for Speed
features.f1Desc: No more manual spreadsheets. Upload your Bill of Quantities (BoQ) and SigiMarga instantly generates real-time S-Curves and tracks financial progress — accurately, every time.
features.f2Desc: Keep a reliable visual record of every project. Upload geotagged photos directly from the field to verify site conditions and track road assets with confidence.
features.f3Desc: Generate polished, data-driven PDF reports in seconds. Ready for stakeholder reviews, audits, and archival — with your branding built right in.

dual.subtitle: Two Views, One Platform
dual.title: Transparency Meets Security
dual.pubDesc: Give citizens of Kota Jambi a clear, real-time window into road project progress. A read-only dashboard with GPS-tagged photos so anyone can see how their roads are being built.
dual.staffDesc: A dedicated workspace for authorized staff to manage contractors, update project progress, and keep everything in sync — backed by enterprise-grade security and real-time collaboration.

specs.subtitle: Under the Hood
specs.title: Reliable, Fast & Secure
specs.s1Desc: Built on Supabase and React Query for instant data updates. Whether you're at the office or on-site, everyone sees the same up-to-date information.
specs.s2Desc: Fully responsive design means field staff can upload GPS-verified photos and update project data right from their phones — no laptop required.
specs.s3Desc: Row Level Security (RLS) ensures public transparency without ever compromising sensitive project data. Your records stay protected.

cta.desc: Take your department's road management digital. SigiMarga handles the complexity so your team can focus on what matters — building and maintaining great roads.
